Package main

Class ApplicationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ApplicationContext
  • public class ApplicationContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that holds the application's context. In other words, this class has a reference to the application's primary stage, as well as all other ApplicationScreens in the program. These ApplicationScreens can be referenced by name using the getAppScreen() method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ApplicationContext​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Create the ApplicationContext

      • getAppScreen

        public ApplicationScreen getAppScreen​(java.lang.String name)
        Get an ApplicationScreen by name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ApplicationScreen to return.
        Returns:

      • getHashMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​ApplicationScreen> getHashMap()
        Get the underlying HashMap used to associate ApplicationScreens and their name. Useful for iterating over all ApplicationScreens.
        Returns:
        The underlying HashMap.

      • getPrimaryStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getPrimaryStage()
